snippet.title: Beach Buggy Racing™2: Island Adventure Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Beach Buggy Racing is back with new tracks, cars, characters, powerups, and new ways to play with your friends and family.  Customize and save your own zany race rules for epic contests with up to 4 local players (8 players on Xbox One and Steam PC!)

https://www.vectorunit.com/bbr2ia

Nintendo Switch:
https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/beach-buggy-racing-2-island-adventure-switch/
Xbox One:
https://www.microsoft.com/store/productid/9n5w8w1ww9j9
PS4:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10002398
Steam PC:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1230800/Beach_Buggy_Racing_2_Island_Adventure/
